questions.question: Which areas of a project are you interested in working in?
Tell us why you want to be a Project Developer on Blueprint!
Tell us about a challenging technical problem you’ve solved.
Would you be interested in joining a scoping pod?
questions.description: Scoping pods include a designer, developer, and PM to join VP Scoping for meetings with NPO’s to provide their opinion and expertise! This will be in addition to the existing responsibilities of your role.
